# Analog photography

In my spare time I like to take photos with one of the old cameras. I quite enjoy the lomography style of taking photos (*Lomography* is a photographic style which involves taking spontaneous photographs with minimal attention to technical details; source [wiki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Toy_camera#Lomography)). I also like to experiment with shooting photos. 

I decided to post the photos on my website to make myself choose the shots I like best and keep them for my records.

## 110 

This film is quite interesting, it's quite small and the photos are quite grainy. I have two cameras that use this film: [Kodak Tele-Ektralite 600](http://camera-wiki.org/wiki/Kodak_Tele-Ektralite_600) (vintage) and the new [Lomomatic 110](https://shop.lomography.com/eu/cameras/lomomatic-110-glass-lens-camera) from Lomography.

This was the first roll of film I shot with the Lomomatic 110. I used Lomography Tiger, ISO 200 film -- I quited liked how the photos turned out, the colors are quite interesting. I shot this in between July and September 2024 in Warsaw, Oxford, London, Tallinn, and Muhu Island, Estonia.
